_header: The first branch is as I told right
_description: Fragment of a religious instructional poem — in couplets

CULAdd4407b.First Lines:
…Þis firste braunche is als I tolde rightTo honoure god
                    moste of myghtBot man mai on thre maneresHonoure god als þe boke
                    vs leres…
CULAdd4407b.Last Lines:
…Or to losongooures þat can make dynGyues giftes for loos
                    purs be to wyn
CULAdd4407b.Note:
One bifolium; the first page very faded and stained by damp, so first
                    lines above are lines 39-42 of the fragment
